languages.text: {n}В уголках глаз Вигдис рассыпаются морщинки — единственный намек на то, что Мастер вокса улыбнулась.{/n} "Рожденные в пустоте нечасто заводят друзей, особенно среди приближенных капитана. Но Идира для многих, понимаете... другая. Как и я. Мы много времени провели вместе — за разговорами, {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасеком{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицидом{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигдис мягко улыбается, и в уголках ее огромных глаз рассыпаются морщинки.{/n} "Рожденные в пустоте нечасто заводят друзей, особенно среди приближенных капитана. Но Идира для многих, понимаете... другая. Как и я. Мы много времени провели вместе — за разговорами, амесеком и регицидом".

languages.text: {n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} over a glass of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}В уголках глаз Вигдис рассыпаются морщинки — единственный намек на то, что Мастер вокса улыбнулась.{/n} "Рожденные в пустоте нечасто заводят друзей, особенно среди приближенных капитана. Но Идира для многих, понимаете... другая. Как и я. Мы много времени провели вместе — за разговорами, {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасеком{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицидом{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}A web of tiny wrinkles appears at the corners of Vigdis' eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The Voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... Different. I am different, too. We spent plenty of time in each other's company over conversation, amasec and regicide."

{n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing regicide over a glass of amasec."

{n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing regicide over a glass of amasec."

{n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} over a glass of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}."

languages.text: {n}Una serie de pequeñas arrugas aparecen junto a los ojos de Vigdis. Es la única señal visible de que la maestra de vocos sonríe.{/n} «Los nacidos del vacío no somos muy dados a hacer amigos, y menos con el séquito de nuestros capitanes, pero verá: muchos consideran que Idira es... diferente. Y yo también soy diferente. Hemos pasado mucho tiempo juntas, hablando de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g} mientras tomábamos una copa de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} over a glass of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una serie de pequeñas arrugas aparecen junto a los ojos de Vigdis. Es la única señal visible de que la maestra de vocos sonríe.{/n} «Los nacidos del vacío no somos muy dados a hacer amigos, y menos con el séquito de nuestros capitanes, pero verá: muchos consideran que Idira es... diferente. Y yo también soy diferente. Hemos pasado mucho tiempo juntas, hablando de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g} mientras tomábamos una copa de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}».

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯的眼角浮现出了细小的皱纹。只有这样的迹象，才暗示着音阵大师正在微笑。{/n}“虚空之子很少会交朋友，而且几乎不会与舰长的随行人员交朋友。但如您所见，很多人也认为伊迪拉……与众不同，我也同样与众不同。我们彼此陪伴过很长时间。我们会一边喝着{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}，一边讨论{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}弑君棋{/g}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} over a glass of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯的眼角浮现出了细小的皱纹。只有这样的迹象，才暗示着音阵大师正在微笑。{/n}“虚空之子很少会交朋友，而且几乎不会与舰长的随行人员交朋友。但如您所见，很多人也认为伊迪拉……与众不同，我也同样与众不同。我们彼此陪伴过很长时间。我们会一边喝着{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}，一边讨论{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}弑君棋{/g}。”

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスの目の端に細かいしわがいくつも刻まれる。このヴォクスマスターが微笑んでいるという唯一の証拠だ。{/n}「虚空生まれは友を作りません。特に船長の側近との間では稀です。ですが、多くの者がイディラを…他とは違うと考えています。私も他の虚空生まれとは異なります。私達は互いの仲間とたくさんの時間を過ごし、{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}をお供に{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}レジサイド{/g}の話をしてきました」
languages.original_text: {n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} over a glass of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスの目の端に細かいしわがいくつも刻まれる。このヴォクスマスターが微笑んでいるという唯一の証拠だ。{/n}「虚空生まれは友を作りません。特に船長の側近との間では稀です。ですが、多くの者がイディラを…他とは違うと考えています。私も他の虚空生まれとは異なります。私達は互いの仲間とたくさんの時間を過ごし、{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}をお供に{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}レジサイド{/g}の話をしてきました」

languages.text: {n}Ein Netz winziger Falten erscheint in Vigdis' Augenwinkeln – der einzige Hinweis darauf, dass die Voxmeisterin lächelt.{/n} "Kinder der Leere schließen selten Freundschaften, schon gar nicht mit dem Gefolge des Captains. Aber Ihr müsst wissen, dass viele Idira für ... anders halten. Ich bin auch anders. Wir haben viel Zeit miteinander verbracht und bei einem Glas {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g} über {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Königsmord{/g} diskutiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} over a glass of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Netz winziger Falten erscheint in Vigdis' Augenwinkeln – der einzige Hinweis darauf, dass die Voxmeisterin lächelt.{/n} "Kinder der Leere schließen selten Freundschaften, schon gar nicht mit dem Gefolge des Captains. Aber Ihr müsst wissen, dass viele Idira für ... anders halten. Ich bin auch anders. Wir haben viel Zeit miteinander verbracht und bei einem Glas {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g} über {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Königsmord{/g} diskutiert."

languages.text: {n}De minuscules ridules apparaissent aux coins des yeux de Vigdis, la seule chose qui vous indique qu'elle sourit.{/n} « Il est rare que les hors-monde se lient d'amitié, surtout avec des membres de l'entourage de leur capitaine. Mais il se trouve qu'Idira est généralement considérée comme étant... différente, ce qui nous fait un point commun. Nous avons passé beaucoup de temps ensemble, à discuter de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g} autour d'un verre d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} over a glass of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}De minuscules ridules apparaissent aux coins des yeux de Vigdis, la seule chose qui vous indique qu'elle sourit.{/n} « Il est rare que les hors-monde se lient d'amitié, surtout avec des membres de l'entourage de leur capitaine. Mais il se trouve qu'Idira est généralement considérée comme étant... différente, ce qui nous fait un point commun. Nous avons passé beaucoup de temps ensemble, à discuter de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g} autour d'un verre d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis'in gözlerinin kenarlarında, Voks Üstadı'nın gülümsediğine dair tek işaret olan ince kırışıklık ağları beliriyor.{/n} "Uçsuzdoğanların fazla arkadaşı olmaz, özellikle de kaptanın maiyetindekiler arasında. Birçokları, İdira'nın... Farklı olduğunu düşünür. Ben de farklıyım. Beraber zaman geçirip bir bardak {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} eşliğinde {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}kral katili{/g} üzerine konuşmuşluğumuz çoktur."
languages.original_text: {n}Webs of tiny wrinkles appear at the corners of Vigdis's eyes — the only hint that the Vox Master is smiling.{/n} "The voidborn seldom make friends, especially among the captain's entourage. But you see, many consider Idira to be... different. I am different, too. We have spent plenty of time in each other's company, discussing {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} over a glass of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis'in gözlerinin kenarlarında ince kırışıklık ağları ortaya çıkıyor. Voks Üstadı'nın gülümsediğine dair tek iz de bu.{/n} "Uçsuzdoğanların fazla arkadaşı olmaz, özellikle de kaptanın maiyetindekiler arasında ama birçok kişi İdira'nın... Farklı olduğunu düşünür. Ben de farklıyım. Beraber zaman geçirip bir bardak {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} eşliğinde {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}kral katili{/g} hakkında sohbet etmişliğimiz çoktur."
